title: The Comfort of Saturdays
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: It was another warm day in a run of fine days, and he took Charlie for a long walk in his back sling round the Braid Hills, on the southern edge of the city. Up there, at the top of Buckstone Snab, the air was cooler, with a breeze blowing  down  from  Stirlingshire and  the  hills of Perthshire beyond. Charlie started to shiver, and his small, snub nose looked red.
